meanings.definition: Gazelles: plural noun, small swift graceful antelope of Africa and Asia
meanings.sent1: The gazelles gracefully leaped across the savannah.
meanings.sent2: In the distance, a herd of gazelles grazed peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The zoo visitors giggled as the playful gazelles chased each other around.
meanings.sent4: Her dance was as elegant and swift as a gazelle in the wild.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gazelles running under the golden sun stayed with him forever.

meanings.definition: Gazelles: verb, to move quickly and gracefully
meanings.sent1: She gazelles through the obstacle course with ease.
meanings.sent2: The ballerina gazelles across the stage, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent3: The children laughed as they tried to gazelles like the gazelles in the nature documentary.
meanings.sent4: Time gazelles by when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The leaves gazelles in the wind, dancing to their own rhythm.
